title: Will Raiden Come Out Victorious In The Ultimate Sword Fight.
description:
Snake continues to move forward through Shadow Moses in pursuit of Liquid. We also encounter an epic battle with Vamp and say goodbye to someone we love!

Epic Creator Code: KindaFunny
